ShadowRootPictureInPictureElement.summary:
The pictureInPictureElement read-only property of the
interface returns the that is currently being
presented in picture-in-picture mode in this shadow tree, or null if
picture-in-picture mode is not currently in use.
ShadowRootPictureInPictureElement.value: A reference to the object that's currently in picture-in-picture mode.Returns null if the shadow tree has no associated element in picture-in-picture mode. For example, there's no picture-in-picture element, or the element is not in the shadow tree.
